title: Hype Gallery in London?
content:
alright peeps   
   
anyone checked this little number out?   
 [http://www.hypegallery.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20050526221407/http:/www.hypegallery.com/)   
   
seems to be weird website but from the sounds of it you can submit some work to them, and you can throw it up on the online exhibition show and also in a exhibition place in london.   
i think im gonna get a piece done for some shameless self promo   
what ya recks?
author: squid
